title: 服务器遇到问题了 开服成功却进不去
txt_content: 进去的时候出现“If you wish to use IP forwarding, please enable it in your bungee config as well”  怎么办啊{:10_503:}

replies.author: jtianweihan
replies.txt_content:
如果用了bungeecord 请在config中把ip－forward设置为true

如果不打算用，到spigot.yml 把bungeecord ＝ 设置为false

replies.author: 薛乐仁
replies.txt_content: 你的IP进行转发了？请取消转发。

replies.author: Kbi_MC
replies.txt_content: 群组服请从bungeecord的端口进入；
